title: What kind of watch does Jhin own?
body:
Not one that counts 24 hours, but one that counts 48 hours. So every 2 days, he can look at the watch and read 44:44

http://pm1.narvii.com/6052/30057cabaa6618de1a3f49cbfab7d5d29e740b8a_hq.jpg

replies.body: Wrong, he doesn't use one watch, he uses FOUR watches. With FOUR pointers (hours, minutes, seconds, and fourths of seconds)
http://i.imgur.com/5eBPgRc.jpg?b
I would upvote but it needs to stay at 4 upvotes
You can always upvote it to 44.
NO!!! 4 IS THE NUMBER! Not 44, 44 is nothing, but FOUR is PERFECTION!!! 1 2 3 4 2 2 3 4
What about 4444?  A number composed of four fours.
four thousand four hundred and fourty four isn't perfection. Only 4 is perfection.

I own 2 accounts so I can both upvote and downvote. 


JK, I have 4 accounts.

I have like 14 accounts myself.

Wish I remembered IDs for even half of them.
Well technically I have a bunch, but y'know, 4.
Damn, it went past me.
I imagine Jhin doesn't count past 4.
Still better than Gabe Newell.

Wait ... why?  I don't know who Gabe Newell is...

EDIT: Looked him up.  Ok, but how is Jhin better than Gabe Newell?
Because Gabe can't even count to 3. (Team fortress 2, Portal 2, Half-life 2... I can't think of a fourth one)

Left 4 Dead 2, DoTA 2

My comment is now the only one that does not have 4 up/downvotes.
;-; I ruined perfection.
If I comment the number 5 do I still get 4 up-votes?
You might end up with -4
He will.
i disliked it to speed it up too lol
PEOPLE NEED TO STOP UPVOTING THIS POST TO 45 OR DOWNVOTING IT TO 43!!!!!!!

why not up vote to 4444? casual. 

P.S. I up-voted your comment to 4 likes.

Hmm ... good idea.  But can we get 4444 upvotes?

Well, we have 44, so we need 4400 more ...

And thanks for the upvote.
Depends.  If you consider how many balancing downvotes this thread probably has, and the fact that we all have 4 accounts (_riiiight?_) I think we can get it there.
I don't get it :I

44:44 as in time.

Think military 24 hour time, just throw on 24 more.

It's a 4 Jhin joke, just upvote to 4. :D
I don't get the 44:44 thing though.

Here.

Just subtract 24 hours from the 48 hour "watch".

20:44

Then translate it via 24 hour system to a 12 hour system

8:44 PM
what the fuck is that supposed to mean? Where the fk is the joke?
Jhin's favorite number is 4. He's obsessed with it. Hence the 44:44 joke (4 digits, each one being 4).

> [{quoted}](name=647BOOM,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fwuvv0xO,comment-id=000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-25T21:21:17.645+0000)
>
> Jhin's favorite number is 4. He's obsessed with it. Hence the 44:44 joke (4 digits, each one being 4).

Everyone also up votes or down votes to 4 or -4 here
You can downvote yourself and lose 2 points :d
Not if two of my accounts upvote you to reach 4.

He's holding 3 fingers up on one hand and 5 fingers on the other

IMPOSTOR
3 fingers plus 5 fingers divided by 2 hands = 4.

No, four fingers plus four fingers plus four fingers plus four fingers divided by four hands equals four

This Jhin has one body, two hands, three fingers and five fingers. Clearly a ploy

Don't be silly, true perfection comes from making beauty out of chaos.  If Jhin was perfect through and through then where would be the art?  4 wouldn't exist without ones, twos, or threes.  It is making four out of such lesser numbers that reveals true beauty.
Can't... Upvote... Would... Break... 44... Upvotes... In.. to... 45... Upvotes... bleaghk
But then how are we supposed to get to 4444 votes
there, upvoted.
I consider downvoting to keep at 44 - please advice!
Why be happy with 44 when one can go for the perfection of 4444

The joke itself was k.

But the pacha edit made me kek.

That film was...
http://img02.deviantart.net/2f4e/i/2016/038/f/7/jhin_meme_by_mikouchan-d9qyb6a.png

Especially because the title has four words in it.

Wait a minute.... you...


oh dear god.

:P

Yes, it's him.

Back again.
Wait what? Am I missing something?
Maybe... ;)
Tell me pls, I wanna know! The suspense is killing me! D:

We're almost at 88 comments!  Then we better STOP.

Also, I have to thank Jhin posts for giving me a crazy amount of upvotes (cause 4 per person).
